definition: to grope about in the dark
to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
see 起早貪黑|起早贪黑[qi3 zao3 tan1 hei1]

sentences.english: In going from room to room in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 摸黑要走到另一个房间去。

sentences.english: One stretch of the road was unlit, so we had to cycle in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 有段路没有路灯，我们就只能摸黑前进。

sentences.english: I would not, could not, in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 我不愿意，也不要摸黑吃。

sentences.english: In the dark he found a water bottle and took a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他摸黑找到一只水瓶，喝了一口水。

sentences.english: The light went out and we were left in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 灯光灭了，剩下我们摸黑呆着。

sentences.english: The old man faltered toward the door-way in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 老人摸黑踉踉跄跄地朝门口走去。

sentences.english: The letter suggested the BBC was " tarnishing and demonising China".
sentences.chinese: 信中表示BBC在“摸黑和妖魔化中国”。

sentences.english: Courage is going to bed without a nightlight.
Eloise got up from the window seat and felt in the dark for her shoes.
sentences.chinese: 艾萝依从窗座起身摸黑找她的鞋子。

sentences.english: The small boy plucked up his courage and went upstairs in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 那个小男孩壮了壮胆，摸黑上了楼。

sentences.english: The whole of this itinerary resembled a descent of black steps.
sentences.chinese: 他走的这整条路线好象是一条在夜间摸黑下山的梯级。

sentences.english: He that touches the pitch shall be defiled.
Victory took beauty took downstairs, this scene was LiuJianMin see.
sentences.chinese: 胜利拉着美丽摸黑下楼，这一幕被刘建民看到。

sentences.english: Not in the dark. Not on a train.
sentences.chinese: 不摸黑吃也不坐火车吃。

definition: midnight/in the middle of the night
lit. the black sky of midnight/very late at night (idiom)
to take the back roads/to take the side streets/to take the small paths
in the depth of night/late at night
(to move or do sth) softly and quietly (idiom)
